attributes.action: Extend weekends to friday till wednesday
attributes.additional_details: It just makes sense, and it looks like there isn't much of that at the moment!
attributes.background: It will generate more jobs and help the economy and make sundays less stressful therefore helping the nations mental health

rejection.details:
UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work. This would be a decision for employers.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317794
